SEARCH
Package gameServer

Class GameServer.Game

java.lang.Object
gameServer.GameServer.Game
Enclosing class:
GameServer
class GameServer.Game extends Object
Game object keeps track of the game status, and maintains the state of the game.

It also provides methods to support behaviour of the game commands.

  • Field Details

    • gameId

      private final String gameId
      Game id of the game.

    • leader

      private final Integer leader
      Index of the leader in the list of players.

    • wordPicker

      private Integer wordPicker
      Index of the word picker in the list of players. It is chosen randomly.

    • players

      private final List<String> players
      List of players in the game.

    • state

      private GameState state
      State of the game.

    • filesUsed

      private final List<String> filesUsed
      List of files used in the game previously. It is used to avoid uploading the same file again in the same game session. The file at last index is the file currently being used in the running game.

    • pickedWords

      private final List<String> pickedWords
      List of words picked in the game previously. It is used to avoid picking the same word again in the same game.

    • currentWord

      private String currentWord
      Word picked by the word picker for the running game.

    • currentWordOccurrenceCount

      private Integer currentWordOccurrenceCount
      Count of the word present in the uploaded file picked by the word picker for the running game.

    • currentFileContent

      private String currentFileContent
      File content of the file uploaded by the leader for the running game.

    • playerGuesses

      private ConcurrentHashMap<String,Integer> playerGuesses
      Map of player's username and corresponding guesses for the running game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      Game(String gameId, String leaderUname)
      Constructor to create a Game. It is initialized with the leader of the game by NEW_GAME command. It also initializes the list of players, files used and picked words as empty collection.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id of the game
      leaderUname - username of the leader of the game

  • Method Details

    • respondPlayers

      public void respondPlayers(String message, boolean skipLeader, boolean skipWordPicker) throws IOException
      Sends messages to all the players in the game.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent to the players.
      skipLeader - flag to skip sending a message to the leader of the game if sent as true.
      skipWordPicker - flag to skip sending a message to the word picker of the game if sent as true.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • respondLeader

      public void respondLeader(String message) throws IOException
      Sends message to the leader of the game.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent to the leader.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • getLeader

      public String getLeader()
      Returns the leader of the game.
      Returns:
      leader of the game

    • isLeader

      public boolean isLeader(String username)
      Checks if the user is the leader of the game.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the player is the leader else false

    • getPlayers

      public List<String> getPlayers()
      returns the list of players in the game.
      Returns:
      list of the players in the game.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerUname) throws IOException
      Adds the player from the game and sets the state of the game as per the rules defined.
      Parameters:
      playerUname - username of the player to be added
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • getState

      public GameState getState()
      Returns the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      current state of the game

    • setState

      public void setState(GameState state)
      Sets the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      state - state of the game

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the gae is full i.e. has maximum number of players.
      Returns:
      true if the game has maximum number of players i.e. 8 else false

    • assignNewLeader

      public void assignNewLeader() throws IOException
      Assigns a new leader to the game, if the previous leader disconnects abruptly.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame()
      Removes the game from the list maintained by all the players as joined games.

    • uploadFile

      public void uploadFile(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Uploads the file to the game and responds to all players as per the requirement.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • respondWordPicker

      private void respondWordPicker(String message) throws IOException
      Sends message to the word picker of the game.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent to the word picker.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • assignWordPicker

      private void assignWordPicker()
      Assigns a word picker to the game randomly except for the leader.

    • isFileAlreadyUsed

      public boolean isFileAlreadyUsed(String fileName)
      Checks if the file is already used in the same game session.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the file is already used in the same game session else false

    • isFileUploaded

      public boolean isFileUploaded()
      Checks if the file is uploaded by the leader for the running game.
      Returns:
      true if the file is uploaded by the leader for the running game else false

    • isWordPicker

      public boolean isWordPicker(String username)
      Checks if the player is the word picker for the running game.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the player is the word picker else false

    • getWordPicker

      public String getWordPicker()
      returns the word picker's username for the running game.
      Returns:
      word picker of the game

    • isValidWord

      public boolean isValidWord(String randomWord)
      Checks if the word picked by the word picker is not used previously and present in the file at least once.
      Parameters:
      randomWord - selected by the word picker word to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the word is not already picked and is present in the uploaded file else false

    • addToPickedWords

      public void addToPickedWords(String randomWord)
      Adds the word picked by the word picker to the list of picked words and sets the value to currentWord. It also calculates the count of the word in the uploaded file.
      Parameters:
      randomWord - selected by the word picker word to be added

    • isWordPicked

      public boolean isWordPicked()
      Checks if the word is picked by the word picker for the running game.
      Returns:
      true if the word is picked by the word picker for the running game else false

    • addPlayersGuess

      public void addPlayersGuess(String username, Integer guess) throws IOException
      It adds the player's guess to the game and calculates the winner if all the players have guessed.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player
      guess - count of the word guessed by the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • restart

      public void restart() throws IOException
      Restarts the game by resetting the state of the game. It assigns a new word picker and responds to all the players.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • isNotInWordPickerState

      public boolean isNotInWordPickerState()
      returns true if the game is not in word picker state else false
      Returns:
      true if the game is not in word picker state else false

    • removePlayerAndResetState

      public void removePlayerAndResetState(String username) throws IOException
      Removes the player from the game after a player sends GOODBYE and sets the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be removed
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • getCurrentlyUploadedFile

      public String getCurrentlyUploadedFile()
      returns the file name of the file uploaded by the leader for the running game.
      Returns:
      file name of the file uploaded by the leader for the running game
